Posts.Content: May 18, 2017 07:53PM Chas23 wrote: I was recently in the same situation as you. I felt a lump. There was a asymmetrical area of increased density on mammogram. My ultrasound was negative and the MRI was inconclusive so the breast surgeon recommended Me to have a lumpectomy due to the way the lump feels. I'm currently awaiting result
Posts.Title: Do I have Biopsy if lump isn't seen on ultrasound? Please help! Greentealeaf Greentealeaf
